content:
"""
Ah, I see the challenge - we need electronic circuits to make an assembling machine, but we need an assembling machine to make electronic circuits! Let's focus on what we can do with our current capabilities:

1. We have iron plates and copper plates
2. We can smelt more resources
3. We can automate the ore collection and smelting process
"""

# Let's focus on improving our smelting setup
# First check what we have
print(f"Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")

# Get our existing furnaces
furnaces = get_entities(set([Prototype.StoneFurnace]))
print("Current furnaces:", furnaces)

# Let's set up another iron ore mining drill
iron_pos = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_pos)

# Place new drill and chest
drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, position=iron_pos, direction=Direction.DOWN)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=5)
chest = place_entity(Prototype.WoodenChest, position=drill.drop_position)

# Create transport belt line from chest to furnaces
belts = connect_entities(
    chest.position,
    furnaces[0].position,
    Prototype.TransportBelt
)

# Let's also set up copper mining
copper_pos = nearest(Resource.CopperOre)
move_to(copper_pos)

# Place copper drill and chest
copper_drill = place_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, position=copper_pos, direction=Direction.DOWN)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, copper_drill, quantity=5)
copper_chest = place_entity(Prototype.WoodenChest, position=copper_drill.drop_position)

print("\nFinal setup:")
print(f"Current inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
print("Entities:", get_entities())
